description: This file defines the ExaTools class, a Python toolkit for interfacing with the Exa web search engine API. It provides methods for performing categorized searches, retrieving content, finding similar links, generating answers based on search results, and conducting deep research. The class manages API interactions, handles timeouts, and formats results in JSON.

classes.name: ExaTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for interacting with the Exa web search engine API, providing search, content retrieval, similarity, question answering, and research functionalities.

methods.name: _execute_with_timeout
methods.description: Executes a given function with a specified timeout using ThreadPoolExecutor.

methods.name: _parse_results
methods.description: Parses the SearchResponse object from Exa API into a formatted JSON string.

methods.name: search_exa
methods.description: Performs a categorized web search using the Exa API and returns results in JSON format.

methods.name: get_contents
methods.description: Retrieves detailed content from specified URLs via the Exa API.

methods.name: find_similar
methods.description: Finds links similar to a given URL using the Exa API.

methods.name: exa_answer
methods.description: Generates an answer to a question based on Exa search results, including citations.

methods.name: research
methods.description: Performs deep research on a topic with optional structured output schema.
